title: Integrated Health/Fitness Application (JavaScript/CSS/HTML)
summary: Collaborated with a team to design and implement an HTML/JS/CSS integrated health app, focusing on user-centric interface design and smooth utility for tracking health and exercise goals.
description: Designed an Integrated application through the use of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The application allows users to track their health and fitness goals through a user-friendly interface. Implemented features such as goal setting, progress tracking, and data visualization to enhance user engagement and motivation.

title: StockTracker (Flask + Python)
summary: Full-stack stock tracking web appliation with login, search, and personalized watchlists.
description: Collaborated on building a full-stack web application using Flask and Python that allows users to track stock market data. Implemented user authentication, stock search functionality, and personalized watchlists. Designed a responsive UI with TailwindCSS and deployed the application on Vercel.

title: Machine Learning Neural Network Models
summary: Implemented perceptron, non-linear regression, digit classification, and language identification neural networks in Python.
description: Developed multiple neural network models from scratch as part of an advanced machine learning course project. Implemented a perceptron classifier, designed and trained models for non-linear regression, MNIST digit classification, and language identification tasks using custom-built forward and backward passes. Optimized training through batching and experimented with network architectures to improve accuracy.
